languages.text: "Орден отправил меня на станцию {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}. Мой долг заключался в помощи местным братьям-{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцам{/g} со старым реликварием, оставшемся еще со времен Парсимуса Девейна, основателя станции".

traits.locale_text: "Орден отправил меня на станцию Футфол. Там я помогала местным братьям-друзианцам заботиться о старом реликварии, оставшемся еще со времен Парсимуса Девейна, основателя станции".

languages.text: "The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."
languages.original_text: "Орден отправил меня на станцию {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}. Мой долг заключался в помощи местным братьям-{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцам{/g} со старым реликварием, оставшемся еще со времен Парсимуса Девейна, основателя станции".

traits.locale_text: "The Order sent me to the Footfall station. I helped the local brotherhood of Drusians care for the old reliquary, which had been there since the times of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."
"The Order sent me to the Footfall station. I helped the local brotherhood of Drusians care for the old reliquary, which had been there since the times of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

"The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I helped the local brotherhood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} care for an old reliquary that had been there since the times of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

"The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I helped the local brotherhood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} care for an old reliquary that had been there since the times of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

"The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local brotherhood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

"The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

languages.text: “是修会派我来{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的，我的任务是协助当地的{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}德鲁苏斯{/g}修会，守护神圣的圣骨匣。这个圣骨匣早在落脚港创始人帕西姆斯·德维恩的时代，就已经放在那里了。”
languages.original_text: "The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

traits.locale_text: “是修会派我来{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的，我的任务是协助当地的{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}德鲁苏斯{/g}修会，守护神圣的圣骨匣。这个圣骨匣早在落脚港创始人帕西姆斯·德维恩的时代，就已经放在那里了。”

languages.original_text: "The order sent me to Footfall. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of Drusians in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

languages.text: «La orden me envió a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Mi misión era ayudar al sacerdocio {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusiano{/g} local a cuidar un relicario sagrado que llevaba aquí desde tiempos de Parsimus Dewain, el fundador de la estación».
languages.original_text: "The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

traits.locale_text: «La orden me envió a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Mi misión era ayudar a la hermandad {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusiana{/g} local a cuidar un relicario sagrado que llevaba aquí desde tiempos de Parsimus Dewain, el fundador de la estación».

languages.text: 「修道会は私を{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}へ派遣した。この任務は、ステーションの創設者であるパルシムス・ドウェインの時代からそこにある聖遺物を管理するために、現地の{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルスス派{/g}を支援することだ」
languages.original_text: "The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

traits.locale_text: 「修道会は私を{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}へ派遣した。この任務は、ステーションの創設者であるパルシムス・ドウェインの時代からそこにある聖遺物を管理するために、現地の{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルスス派{/g}を支援することだ」

languages.text: "Der Orden hat mich nach {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} geschickt. Ich sollte der örtlichen Bruderschaft der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g} helfen, ein heiliges Reliquiar aus den Zeiten von Parsimus Dewain zu beschützen, dem Gründer der Station."
languages.original_text: "The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

traits.locale_text: "Der Orden hat mich nach {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} geschickt. Ich sollte der örtlichen Bruderschaft der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g} helfen, ein heiliges Reliquiar aus den Zeiten von Parsimus Dewain zu beschützen, dem Gründer der Station."

languages.text: « L'ordre m'a envoyée à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. Ma mission consistait à aider le clergé de {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusiens{/g} local à entretenir un reliquaire sacré qui se trouve là depuis l'époque de Parsimus Dewain, le fondateur de la station. »
languages.original_text: "The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

traits.locale_text: « L'ordre m'a envoyée à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. Ma mission consistait à aider la confrérie de {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusiens{/g} locale à entretenir un reliquaire sacré qui se trouve là depuis l'époque de Parsimus Dewain, le fondateur de la station. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'a{/g} düzenimin emriyle geldim. Bölgedeki {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drususçu{/g} rahiplerine, kurucusu Parsimus Dewain'in zamanından beridir var olan bir kutsal emanet odasının korumalarında yardımcı olmakla görevliydim."
languages.original_text: "The order sent me to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. My undertaking was to assist the local priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g} in caring for a sacred reliquary that had been there since the time of Parsimus Dewain, the station's founder."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'a düzenimin emriyle geldim. Bölgedeki bir {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drususçu{/g} rahipliğine kurucusu Parsimus Dewain'in zamanından kalma bir kutsal emanet odasının korunmasında yardımcı olmakla görevliydim."
